message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.RO, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a novel algorithm for integrating episodic memory into a reinforcement learning agent, which falls under the category of machine learning and artificial intelligence. Specifically, the algorithm uses reservoir sampling to maintain an external memory, which involves techniques from probability and statistics. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Additionally, the paper also discusses the use of the algorithm in robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY), which are relevant sub-categories.
